org.gbif.portal.action.occurrence

Class ExecuteDownloadAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseAction
        • org.gbif.portal.action.occurrence.ExecuteDownloadAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware

    public class ExecuteDownloadAction
extends BaseAction
    Executes a download request. This action has to be executed using a POST method, and error is thrown in any other case.
    See Also:
